EmailTemplate.name: NorthAm_Event_LA Open House_Q415.Confirmation
EmailTemplate.subject: You are confirmed to attend the Pivotal Los Angeles Open House (November 10)
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Thank you for registering for the Pivotal Los Angeles Open House <pivotal.io/event/open-house/la>. Event details can be found below.
Date: November 10, 2015 Time: 6:00 PM - 9:00 PM Location: Pivotal <https://www.google.com/maps/place/1333+2nd+St,+Santa+Monica,+CA+90401/@34.0157177,-118.4996616,17z/data=!3m1!4b1!4m2!3m1!1s0x80c2a4cff165ae37:0xb2e0f317bfeb9f0c>, 1333 2nd Street, Suite 200, Santa Monica, 90401
Should you have any questions or would like more information, please email info@pivotal.io <mailto:info@pivotal.io>. We look forward to seeing you on Tuesday, November 10th!
Sincerely, The Pivotal Team
